      Returns a List of Message entities matching the given Predicate. In case no match could be found, an empty List is returned.

      @Transactional public Optional<Message> findOneForUpdate​(@NonNull @NonNull Long id)
      Description copied from interface: MessageService
      Retrieves an Message by its id. Applies row lock in ensure that only one session can modify it at a time.

      Notice: Can only be called within a transaction scope. Else ...
